colorTheory.description: The color palette combines a bold primary color with a clean background and supporting text colors for readability.
colorTheory.mood: The palette conveys a sense of professionalism and clarity.
colorTheory.accessibility: High contrast ratios between text and background colors ensure readability and accessibility.
colorTheory.colorRelationships: The primary accent color (#00A99D) stands out against the light background (#FFFFFF) while the secondary color (#FFFFFF) provides a clean backdrop for text content.
